src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Lunis, Sara Danius, segretària permanente de sa Commissione Nobel pro sa Literadura in s’Acadèmia Isvedesa, at annuntziadu durante unu programma ràdiu in Sveriges Radio in Isvètzia chi sa commissione, chi non resesset a cuntatare a Bob Dylan subra de sa vitòria de su Prèmiu Nobel pro sa Literadura in su 2016, at ismitidu de s’isfortzare a proare.
hyp_text: In s'abbidu, Sara Danius, segretrà permanenti de su Nobel pro sa literadura a s'Acadèmia de Suedia, at annuntziada publicamente durante unu programa de ràdiu in Sveriges Ràdiu in Suedia ca su comitadu, non podiat arribbare a Bob Dylan direttamente in rasunu de sa Prèmiu Nobel de sa literadura de su 2016, at abandonadu is esfortzios de arribbare a èlu.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: S’epidemia at ispintu su guvernu de s’Ìndia a pigare medidas comente s’imbiu de cassadores de porcos in sas àreas interessadas meda, partzende mìgias de tendas pro su muschitu e isperzende pestitzidas.
hyp_text: S'outbrù s'at corrispundu a su governu indiu a pigare misuras comente depoiu de pigadores in zonas affettadas gravemente, distribuidas de mileghinas de cortinas de moscutu e spraiduras de pesticidas.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Sos Tres regnos fiat una de sas eras prus sambenàrias de s’istòria de sa Tzina antiga milli e milli persones si nche sunt mortas gherrende pro si sèdere su setidòrgiu prus artu de su grandu palatzu de Xi’an.
hyp_text: Sos Tres Rennos fiat unu de is periódos sangrientas in sa Istòria de sa Cina Antiga, mìllas de pessones morrerent combattentes pro siare in sa càtedra prus auta in su palatzu majore de Siàn.

src_text: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.

src_text: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
ref_text: Sa fàuna rara comente s’orsu brunu europeu, su lupu, s’àcuila, s’istria, sa lintze, su pisitu agreste e su puddu tzedrone si podent agatare inoghe, paris cun medas àteras genias comunas.
hyp_text: S'istatziones de fauna rara comente su su orso brunu, lupu, aquila, strisciò, lince, gatto selvaticu e capriolu, podet essi trobatas, aghja cun prus especie comunas
